/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from the middle of the street, looking towards the horizon. The street is lined with lush green trees on both sides, creating a natural canopy overhead. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds. Power lines stretch across the scene, running parallel to the street. On the right side of the street, there's a blue truck parked, adding a touch of urban life to the otherwise serene landscape. The image is captured from a low angle, giving a sense of depth and scale to the scene. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky. The overall composition of the image suggests a peaceful day in a city where nature and urban life coexist harmoniously.
